version2.prototype.summary.zonal

Class ZonalSummaryCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • version2.prototype.summary.zonal.ZonalSummaryCalculator

  • public class ZonalSummaryCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the zonal summary for a given raster file using the defined SummariesCollection object.
    Author:
    michael.devos

                              java.io.File outTableFile,
                              java.lang.String zoneField,
                              SummariesCollection summariesCollection)
        Creates a ZonalSummaryCalculator.
        Parameters:
        projectName - - current project's name
        inRasterFile - - input raster file
        inShapeFile - - input shape file
        outTableFile - - where to write output to
        zoneField - - zone field name to use
        summariesCollection - - collection of summary calculations to run on raster data

      • getZoneFieldId

        public int getZoneFieldId(java.sql.Connection conn,
                          java.lang.String mSchemaName,
                          java.lang.String shapefile,
                          java.lang.String field)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Looks up the zoneFieldID for the specified (shapefile, field) pair. A new zoneFieldID is created if there is no matching record. Do this in a transaction!
        Parameters:
        conn - - database connection
        mSchemaName - - name of schema for this zonal summary
        shapefile - - the currently used shape file
        field - - zonal field to use
        Returns:
        ID of a zone field
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getZoneId

        public int getZoneId(java.sql.Connection conn,
                     java.lang.String mSchemaName,
                     int zoneFieldId,
                     int zone)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Looks up the zoneID for the specified (zoneFieldID, zone) pair. A new zoneID is created if there is no matching record. Do this in a transaction!
        Parameters:
        conn - - database connection
        mSchemaName - - name of schema for this zonal summary
        zoneFieldId - - ID of zone field within database
        zone - - field name associated with the zoneFieldId
        Returns:
        zone ID for zoneFieldID and zone pairing, null if none exists.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • lookupZoneFieldId

        public java.lang.Integer lookupZoneFieldId(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                           java.lang.String mSchemaName,
                                           java.lang.String shapefile,
                                           java.lang.String field)
                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Looks up the zoneFieldID for the specified (shapefile, field) pair. Returns null if there is no matching record.
        Parameters:
        conn - - database connection
        mSchemaName - - name of schema for this zonal summary
        shapefile - - the currently used shape file
        field - - zonal field to use
        Returns:
        field ID of zone field.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • lookupZoneId

        public java.lang.Integer lookupZoneId(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                      java.lang.String mSchemaName,
                                      int zoneFieldId,
                                      int zone)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Looks up the ZoneID for the specified (zoneFieldID, zone) pair. Returns null if there is no matching record.
        Parameters:
        conn - - database connection
        mSchemaName - - name of schema for this zonal summary
        zoneFieldId - - ID of zone field within database
        zone - - field name associated with the zoneFieldId
        Returns:
        zone ID for zoneFieldID and zone pairing, null if none exists.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.sql.SQLException
